title: Stadia Changelog: World War Z arrives, Crayta debuts ‘Curse Galleons’ season
content:
Google added one new game to Stadia this week with the debut of World War Z, but it wasn’t the only news on the platform.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: World War Z arrives, Crayta debuts ‘Curse Galleons’ season appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Free with a subscription, the co-op shooter World War Z Aftermath is now available on Google Stadia, and there's even a demo.
